content.title: Asangathit Karmakaar Silai Machine Sahayata Yojana
content.details: The Asangathit Karmakaar Silai Machine Sahayata Yojana (Unorganized Workers Sewing Machine Assistance Scheme) is a government scheme in Chhattisgarh State that provides sewing machines. The objective of this scheme is to promote unorganized workers in their businesses and make them self-reliant.
benefits: Sewing machines will be supplied every year to the registered unorganized women workers of the state.
eligibility: Women who work in construction and are registered with the labor board/department.

Women between the ages of 18 and 50 who sew, embroider, or weave (tailor) clothes, are employed by an employer or have their own business, and earn a living for themselves and their families, in any district of the state.
Women who have not received a sewing machine or an amount equal to the value of a sewing machine under any other scheme run by the state government.
Women who have not received benefits under the Chief Minister Cycle Assistance Scheme run by the labor board/department.

faqs.question: What is the scheme?
faqs.answer: Asangathit Karmakaar Silai Machine Sahayata Yojana started by the Government of Chhattisgarh in 2012.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, sewing machines will be supplied every year to the registered unorganized women workers of the state.

faqs.question: May same beneficiary will get the benefits twice?
faqs.answer: No, Beneficiaries will only get the benefits at once.

faqs.question: Who will get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Women who work in construction and are registered with the labor board/department.

faqs.question: What is the eligible age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant women should be between the age of 18 and 50.

faqs.question: If a beneficiary already received the same benefits under any other scheme run by the state government, Is she eligible for this scheme?
If a beneficiary already received the benefits of Chief Minister Cycle Assistance Scheme run by the labor board/department, Is she eligible for this scheme?
How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. Applicant have to visit the official website. 2. Click on apply now under the Unorganized worker board option. 3. Now applicant have to provide the few details. 4. Now select the scheme name here. 5. Fill out the online form. 6. Upload required documents. 7. Click on submit.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Labor registration card. 2. Age certificate. 3. Bank passbook photocopy. 4. Income certificate.
